name: Portgas .D. Ace
text: Activate: Main You may return this character to its owner's hand. Look at the top 5 cards of your deck, then place them in any order on the top or bottom of your deck.

effect.text: You may return this character to its owner's hand. Look at the top 5 cards of your deck, then place them in any order on the top or bottom of your deck.
